text:
Mandarin Oriental, Milan Celebrates Finale Of Expo Milano 2015 With An Evening With Cecilia Bartoli At La Scala
Mandarin Oriental, Milan is offering an opportunity to see celebrated Italian singer, Cecilia Bartoli, at La Scala on 27 October 2015. Held to celebrate the finale of Expo Milano 2015, guests can see the concert as part of a luxurious accommodation package, An Evening with Cecilia Bartoli at La Scala. A celebrity fan of Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group and a Grammy Award winner, Cecilia Bartoli has sold more than 10 million albums worldwide.
Situated in the chic Montenapoleone district, Mandarin Oriental, Milan is only steps away from La Scala and ideally located for guests wanting to explore the city during their stay.
By booking An Evening with Cecilia Bartoli at La Scala, guests will have two of the best seats reserved for them at the theatre to watch her mesmerising performance. Before walking round the corner to La Scala, guests can enjoy a pre-concert, two-course dinner at Mandarin Bar. Relaxing within the bistro bar’s sophisticated black and white geometric interiors, guests can set the tone for their evening by ordering specially made cocktails before savouring Chef Antonio Guida’s contemporary re-interpretation of traditional Italian cuisine.
Valid on 27 and either 26 or 28 October 2015 only, An Evening with Cecilia Bartoli at La Scala at Mandarin Oriental, Milan is priced from EUR 2,466, and includes:
Two nights stay with a daily buffet breakfast for two people
Pre-concert, light dinner at Mandarin Bar
Tickets for two of the best seats at La Scala to watch Cecilia Bartoli in concert
Cecilia Bartoli is one of 29 celebrity Mandarin Oriental fans who form part of the Group’s multi-million US dollar global advertising campaign, ‘He’s a Fan/She’s a Fan’. In appreciation of their support, the Group makes a donation to each celebrity’s favourite charity.
Source:- Mandarin Oriental
